question: In which year, Goa was declared as Indiaâ€™s 25th state?
explanation: Goa was part of the Union Territory of Goa, Daman and Diu from 19 December 1961 to 30 May 1987. On 30 May, 1987, Goa was admiited as 25th state of Indian Union. Pratapsingh Rane was elected as the first Chief Minister of the newly formed state.
